title: A Sporting year
creator_credit: British Travel Association and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: A newsreel compilation of the main sporting events in Britain in 1963, including international athletics at the White City Stadium, tennis at Wimbledon , cricket at Lords and the Football Cup Finals at Wembley.
description: A newsreel compilation of the main sporting events in Britain in 1963, including international athletics at the White City Stadium, tennis at Wimbledon , cricket at Lords and the Football Cup Finals at Wembley.
